title: Beautiful movie.
review: Enjoyed the movie. Lovely story with lots of funny parts. Characters are cute. Happy befana day! 😂😊👍

title: Uplifting and joyous...
review: Fun film for the whole family. Not a Christmas romance like most of the new Christmas films that are released. Very funny and humble at times. Clever story line. Barbara Eden graces the film as Mrs. Claus! She was great!!

title: So cute
review: Denise Richards is wonderful. Patrick Muldoon and she have great chemistry while Barbara Eden as Mrs. Clause is the cherry on top!
